Class FileService

java.lang.Object
application.FileService
public class FileService extends Object
Singleton service class to handle file operations. Manages file creation, deletion, reading, updating and directory operations.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static FileService getInstance() throws SQLException
      Gets the singleton instance of FileService.
      Returns:
      the FileService instance
      Throws:
      SQLException - if initialization fails

    • createFile

      public String createFile(Path directory, String filename)
      Creates a new file in the specified directory. Encrypts the file content using the current user's password.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory where the file will be created
      filename - the name of the file to create
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • deleteFile

      public String deleteFile(Path directory, String filename)
      Deletes a file from the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory where the file is located
      filename - the name of the file to delete
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • readFile

      public String readFile(Path directory, String filename)
      Reads the content of a file from the specified directory. Decrypts the file content using the current user's password.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory where the file is located
      filename - the name of the file to read
      Returns:
      the decrypted content or error message

    • createRepository

      public String createRepository(Path directory, String directoryName)
      Creates a new repository (directory) in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directory - the parent directory path
      directoryName - the name of the new directory to create
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • listFiles

      public String listFiles(Path directoryPath)
      Lists all files and directories in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path of the directory to list files from
      Returns:
      a formatted string of file names or error message

    • updateFile

      public String updateFile(Path directory, String filename, String newContent)
      Updates the content of a file in the specified directory. Encrypts the new content using the current user's password.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory where the file is located
      filename - the name of the file to update
      newContent - the new content to write to the file
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • configureIntegrity

      public void configureIntegrity(Path rootDir)
      Configures integrity checking for files. Initializes the HashService and IntegrityStore.
      Parameters:
      rootDir - the root directory for integrity storage
